Once you start making money, you should buy her another one to make up for it." "Alright, I will."

en: My parents accompanied me to the airport.
zh: 我父母陪我去了机场。

en: I found out too late.
zh: 我发现得太晚了。

en: Could you send this letter for me?
zh: 你能帮我寄这封信吗？

en: The way you smile is wonderful.
zh: 你微笑的样子真好看。

en: Tom's dog never barks.
zh: 汤姆的狗从不叫。

en: There was a school shooter threat at my school today.
zh: 今天我们学校发生了校园枪击威胁。

en: It seems that my school received a bomb threat today.
zh: 好像我们学校今天收到了炸弹威胁。

en: Tom came to visit me.
zh: 汤姆来看我了。

en: Today, we had an evacuation drill at school.
zh: 今天，我们在学校进行了疏散演习。

en: I know a shortcut. Follow me.
zh: 我知道一条捷径。跟我来。

en: On our campus, we have earthquake drills at least once a year.
zh: 在我们的校园里，我们每年至少进行一次地震演习。

en: If I were you, I'd go home and take a nap.
zh: 如果我是你，我就回家睡个午觉。

en: Is your math homework done?
zh: 你的数学作业做完了吗？

en: What color do you use when you paint the sun?
zh: 你画太阳的时候用什么颜色？

en: Tom had never used a washing machine before.
zh: 汤姆以前从没用过洗衣机。

en: Children under age five are free.
zh: 五岁以下的儿童免费。

en: I'm on a hunger strike.
zh: 我正在绝食。

en: Tom is always outwardly calm.
zh: 汤姆总是表面上很冷静。

en: Tom is around my age.
zh: 汤姆和我差不多大。

en: "Hey, let's play." "But I thought you had homework to do?" "Yeah, but I don't want to do it."
zh: “嘿，我们一起玩吧。” “但我以为你有作业要做呢？” “是啊，但是我不想做。”

en: If you don't keep your guard up in life, one day you'll regret it.
zh: 如果你在生活中不保持警惕，总有一天你会后悔的。

en: If you live life cutting corners, it'll come back to bite you someday.
zh: 如果你生活偷工减料，总有一天会自食恶果。

en: Please don't follow me.
zh: 请不要跟着我。

en: Please open the boot.
zh: 请打开后备箱。

en: Tom and I are the same generation.
zh: 我和汤姆是同一代人。

en: You're really full of curiosity, aren't you?
zh: 你真是好奇心旺盛，是不是？

en: If you do that again, I'll spank you.
zh: 你再这样，我就打你屁股。

en: With a cup of coffee your head becomes clear.
zh: 一杯咖啡能让你头脑清醒。

en: One cup of coffee and your head will clear up.
zh: 一杯咖啡就能让你头脑清醒。

en: I am not able to drink Japanese wine.
zh: 我喝不了日本葡萄酒。

en: I am not able to drink sake.
zh: 我喝不了日本清酒。

en: I can't drink Japanese wine.
zh: 我喝不了日本葡萄酒。

en: I can't drink sake.
zh: 我喝不了日本清酒。

en: There are people that make a show out of pointing out other's mistakes.
zh: 有些人喜欢炫耀，专门挑别人的错。

en: Why didn't you stop by my place today?
zh: 你今天为什么没来我家坐坐？

en: Please give me an extra pillow.
zh: 请给我一个额外的枕头。

en: I'll do it if you show me how.
zh: 你教我，我就做。

en: Reading hieroglyphs is difficult.
zh: 阅读象形文字很困难。

en: She argued with him about raising children.
zh: 她和他争论关于抚养孩子的问题。

en: At this stage, I cannot say anything.
zh: 在这个阶段，我什么都不能说。

en: Excuse me. May I use your bathroom?
zh: 打扰一下，我可以借用一下洗手间吗？

en: She wrote a letter to John.
zh: 她给约翰写了一封信。

en: He drank water from this spring.
zh: 他喝了这泉水。

en: At this stage, I can't say anything.
zh: 在这个阶段，我什么都不能说。

en: Please give me another pillow.
zh: 请再给我一个枕头。

en: A different pillow, please.
zh: 请给我一个不一样的枕头。

en: Give me a different pillow, please.
zh: 请给我一个不一样的枕头。

en: Please give me a different pillow.
zh: 请给我一个不一样的枕头。

en: "Eep, my shirt's on backward! Hold on, you already knew, didn't you? Why didn't you tell me? I literally just gave a big lecture looking like this!" "Well, they say ignorance is bliss. I just figured it'd be best if I didn't say anything."
zh: “哎呀，我的衬衫穿反了！等等，你早就知道了，是不是？你为什么不告诉我？我刚刚就穿着这样讲了一大堆！ ”“嗯，他们说不知者无罪。我想最好还是什么都别说。”

en: Tom is making some french toast.
zh: 汤姆正在做一些法式吐司。

en: Tom needs to explain that to Mary.
zh: 汤姆需要向玛丽解释一下。

en: You have some ink on your face.
zh: 你脸上沾了些墨水。

en: The failure depressed Tom.
zh: 失败让汤姆感到沮丧。

en: This is a free service.
zh: 这是一项免费服务。

en: I said nothing about it.
zh: 我对此只字未提。

en: I lived in Boston until I was thirteen years old.
zh: 我十三岁之前一直住在波士顿。

en: Tom is drinking whiskey.
zh: 汤姆正在喝威士忌。

en: I heard that from Tom.
zh: 我从汤姆那里听说的。

en: I need a suitcase. Will you lend me one?
zh: 我需要一个手提箱。你能借我一个吗？

en: I will answer you within three days.
zh: 我会在三天内回复你。

en: We will get back to you within 3 working days.
zh: 我们会在3个工作日内回复您。

en: Is there a gift shop around here?
zh: 这附近有礼品店吗？

en: To make a long story short, I was fired.
zh: 长话短说，我被解雇了。

en: This is not cheating.
zh: 这不是作弊。

en: This is not trickery.
zh: 这不是欺骗。

en: This is not a sham.
zh: 这不是骗局。

en: This isn't cheating.
zh: 这不是作弊。

en: This is not fake.
zh: 这不是假的。

en: I've been working here since last October.
zh: 我从去年十月开始在这里工作。

en: Tom tried to leave the restaurant without paying.
zh: 汤姆试图不付钱就离开餐厅。

en: Tom went to the beach with his friends.
zh: 汤姆和他的朋友们一起去了海滩。

en: Tom went to the river to swim.
zh: 汤姆去河里游泳了。

en: Tom jumped in the river and started swimming.
zh: 汤姆跳进河里开始游泳。

en: We went to the beach last weekend to swim.
zh: 上周末我们去海滩游泳了。

en: I went swimming almost every day during my summer vacation.
zh: 暑假期间我几乎每天都去游泳。

en: I like swimming in lakes and rivers more than swimming in the ocean.
zh: 我喜欢在湖里和河里游泳，胜过在海里游泳。

en: The soldiers crossed the river by swimming.
zh: 士兵们游泳过河。

en: The soldiers swam across the river.
zh: 士兵们游过了河。

en: Our school has a gym but not a swimming pool.
zh: 我们学校有健身房，但是没有游泳池。

en: There's a lake nearby where we can swim.
zh: 附近有个湖，我们可以去游泳。

en: If you live near water, you should teach your children to swim.
zh: 如果你住在水边，你应该教你的孩子游泳。

en: You have some rice on your face.
zh: 你脸上沾了些米饭。

en: I like your face.
zh: 我喜欢你的脸。

en: I have an appointment to dine with Tom.
zh: 我约了汤姆一起吃饭。

en: A cat is walking on the roof.
zh: 一只猫正在屋顶上走。

en: Do you want to go to a coffee shop?
zh: 你想去咖啡店吗？

en: My father doesn't eat much fruit.
zh: 我爸爸不怎么吃水果。

en: It's my first time coming to an aquarium.
zh: 这是我第一次来水族馆。

en: Have you ever seen the northern lights?
zh: 你见过北极光吗？

en: I need a suitcase. Could I borrow one of yours?
zh: 我需要一个行李箱。我可以借用你的一个吗？

en: Go brush your teeth now.
zh: 现在去刷牙。

en: Ask the policeman over there.
zh: 去问那边那个警察。

en: Tom passed away a few days ago.
zh: 汤姆几天前去世了。

en: I'm going to assume that they have their own circumstances.
zh: 我先假设他们有自己的情况。

en: Eat. Don't get distracted.
zh: 吃吧。别分心。

en: Did you sleep well yesterday?
zh: 你昨天睡得好吗？

en: Tom was a very nice guy.
zh: 汤姆是个非常好的人。

en: I want to invite Tom and Mary over for dinner.
zh: 我想邀请汤姆和玛丽来家里吃晚饭。

en: Tom bought a used truck.
zh: 汤姆买了一辆二手卡车。

en: Both are possible.
zh: 两种都有可能。
